verses.roman:
sei rātre prabhu tāhāṅ cinte mane mana
saṅge saṅghaṭṭa bhāla nahe, kaila sanātana

synonyms: sei rātre—that night; prabhu—the Lord; tāhāṅ—there; cinte—thinks; mane—within His mind; mana—the mind; saṅge—with Him; saṅghaṭṭa—crowds of men; bhāla nahe—is not good; kaila sanātana—Sanātana has so spoken.
translation: That night the Lord considered Sanātana Gosvāmī's proposal that He should not go to Vṛndāvana followed by so many people.
